name: Flying Cannon
description: A flying cannon that moves vertically and is triggered by a local variable.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor. (0 = always active)

fields.name: Vertical Movement Width
fields.description: The width of the vertical movement of the cannon.

fields.name: Movement Behavior
fields.description: Defines when the cannon starts moving.

1.name: Moving after first use
1.description: The cannon starts moving only after it has been used once.
